author: ROBERT HOUK rhouk@sixriversmedia.com
title: Washington County acts to reauthorize school security funds | Education | johnsoncitypress.com
text:
Washington County commissioners are moving to reinstate $3.5 million in education capital funds for security upgrades at county schools.
Featured
|
News Article
News Article
Washington County acts to reauthorize school security funds
- By ROBERT HOUK rhouk@sixriversmedia.com
The Washington County School System is making security upgrades to the entrances of Daniel Boone and David Crockett high schools.
- By ROBERT HOUK rhouk@sixriversmedia.com
- By ROBERT HOUK rhouk@sixriversmedia.com
